---

**About follow-ups:** If we need additional information to help evaluate your feature request, we'll let you know by adding a `needs-more-info` label. You'll have plenty of time to respond (we'll send a friendly reminder after 10 days). If we don't hear back after 14 days total, the issue will be automatically closed to keep things organized, but you're always welcome to reopen it or create a new one when you're ready. We appreciate your contribution to making Sanity better!
